SUB_W06_WRLD_SIUG_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_WRLD_SIUG_000_CUT_000_000.text:
The walls and floors of this place pulsate
with life. This world must exist within
some manner of living being.

SUB_W06_WRLD_SIUG_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_WRLD_SIUG_000_CUT_000_010.text:
While it pleases me to observe the darkness of
humankind, to encounter an unknown world is
no less of a thrill. My lips curl in anticipation of
what intriguing beings I might meet here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Something is over there.
Let us go see for ourselves.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: You there. I seek your counsel.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Blurp! There it is! The foreign body that's
thrown the entire Kosmos into turmoil!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I do not deny I am a foreigner,
but I seek no turmoil.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Don't try to deceive me with that cooperative
manner! I may not know what you want, but I
know enough to excise a malignancy on sight!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I seek intriguing beings.
You clearly do not qualify.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Huh. Despite being a malignancy, you're not
taking any aggressive action... I guess it's
possible that you're actually benign?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I leave that question to the judgment
of each creature who beholds Siugnas,
the Dismal King.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Then I deem you a benignancy, Siugnas,
and therefore not subject to excision.
But if this is an attempt at deception,
you will pay for it in blood and bile!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I am Byaku, a priest that protects
the integrity of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
So this world is called the Kosmos?
Yes, perhaps there are matters here
that will prove of interest to me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Maintaining the status quo is of the utmost
importance here, which is why abnormalities
of a malign nature are excised. Abnormalities of a merely 'intriguing'
sort don't really exist in the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
That said, I acknowledge your interest in the
Kosmos—and as a priest, I respect your desire
to learn more about our world. I'm currently in the midst of my rounds,
but you may accompany me if you wish.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
You are in every manner a very
peculiar being. I will need you
to be on your best behavior.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: I shall do what I can.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Fair enough! Now then, my rounds often take
me to dangerous places. As my forte is defense,
I would be pleased if you could assume a more
offensive role.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Remind me who it was that attempted
to 'excise' me mere moments ago?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, I'm sure I couldn't say.
Now then, our first destination
is over there, so let us be off.
Locomotion, ho!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_00.text:
This is the Digestica, one of our four great
temples. At this holy site, substances from
the outer worlds are processed and broken
down to provide energy to the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.text: A pillar of the Kosmos, is it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Defending these temples is the primary
duty for those in the Order of Leukos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.text:
And is this Digestica's condition what you
would call 'normal'? Because it appears
to me that its life force is waning.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Yes, I noticed this as well; an abnormality
seems to have emerged for some reason.
We will need to investigate at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_05.text: I sense a presence over there.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_06.text:
A foreign body—and the malignant kind!
You must excise it at once!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_00.text:
The malignancies that infiltrate the body
hide in all manner of places, and seek nothing
less than the destruction of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.text:
I have excised your malignancy, but see
no sign of improvement in the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_02.text:
Which means the source of the anomaly
must lie elsewhere. Do you perceive
anything unusual, Siugnas?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_03.text:
Only this oily substance upon the
pillars surrounding the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_00.text:
Ah, yes! Those are fat globules. While the Kosmos
requires them to function, I doubt the Digestica
would be able to process so many at once.
This may indeed be the anomaly we seek.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_01.text:
The life force of the pillars is waning.
If we excise these fat globules, they may
yet reclaim the power they once held.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_02.text:
We must destroy the fats. Let us break them
into smaller pieces so they will be easier
for the Digestica to process and unload.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
To think that malignancies have infested
even this most sacred of lands...
We must be ever vigilant!

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
There is little danger here;
these fats are a small matter.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
That was the last of the fats.
If we repair the Digestica now,
it should resume its normal function.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_00.text: Is that not the end of your rounds?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_01.text:
The end? By the Kosmos, no!
Now we head to the other temples.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_00.text:
The flow in this passage has been restored.
We can use it to reach our destination.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.text:
What an unusual passage.
Is this also alive?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Pray cease flapping your mandible
and come with me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Is it blood that fills these passages?
...No. It is similar, but not identical.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the Respiquary—the temple that
controls the atmosphere of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The life force of this temple
also seems rather diminished.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_020.text: Byaku! How are you today, sir?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, that's Blan, one of the junior priests.
He's been assigned to the Respiquary guard.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The temple is emitting wind.
Is this normal?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Of course it is! Do you not remember me
telling you how the Respiquary controls
the atmosphere?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Is that weird foreign body
bothering you, sir!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_090.text: I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Siugnas is a very unusual foreign body,
but he is no malignancy. Please treat him
as you would any of my subordinates.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I do not recall subordinating
myself to you, priest.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_120.text: Also, now that you mention it, the wind is blowing a bit more strongly than usual. I wonder what that's about.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_010.text: Anomaly, sir! We have an anomaly!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_020.text:
We must investigate this at once.
To the Respiquary!

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_WIND_STORM01_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_WIND_STORM01_000_CUT_0.text:
This wind will make it difficult
to approach the temple directly.
Let us circle around it.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_WIND_STORM03_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_WIND_STORM03_000_CUT_0.text:
Blast! The wind's too strong to
approach it from this direction.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_000.text:
The Respiquary's condition is irregular.
It must be repaired at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_010.text: Can these repairs be made quickly?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_030.text: It must have blown in on the wind.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_010_000.text:
Let us repair the Respiquary at once.
Give us a hand, Blan.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_000.text:
We merely slapped a bandage over the problem,
but that should keep it working for a while.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_010.text:
The life force is returning to the temple.
You are truly clever for a blob.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_020.text:
Those born into the priesthood have a sacred
duty to protect the Kosmos, and have been
blessed with the power to repair the temples. One could say we are the chosen elite,
beings selected by the very Kosmos itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_030.text:
Thank you for the assistance, sir!
I can take it from here!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_040.text:
Good, because I must return to my rounds—
and between the events at the Digestica
and this, I fear some evil is afoot.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I again sense the life force
draining from your temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
This is the Cognitheon—the center of the Kosmos,
and the place that controls all other holy sites.
As I feared, there is an anomaly here. We must find and excise it with all speed,
for if the Cognitheon were to shut down
the entire Kosmos would descend into chaos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Is there no other priest
to defend this site?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
A contemporary of mine in the
priesthood named Safed should
be here, but I do not see him.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
You had best repair your
temple quickly, then.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Indeed. Whatever this anomaly is, it appears
to have severed the Cognitheon's connection
to the circuits which supply its power.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh dear. I have never seen such a thing.
I'm not even sure how to approach this...

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Then there is nothing to be done but watch
as the Kosmos spirals to its destruction.
Regardless, it matters naught to me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_090.text:
I do not accept that. As a priest,
it is my duty to defend the Kosmos.
There must be some clue within these
circuits... Ah! Look there!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_000.text:
I see one circuit that differs from the others.
A small amount of electricity is still flowing
through it, but its range is insufficient to
reach the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Then we must create a path
so it might flow unimpeded.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_020.text:
Connect circuit to circuit until the flow
reaches the Cognitheon? An interesting
proposal—and one certainly worth trying.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Shall we try joining that
circuit to its neighbor?

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
A fine idea. But first, we must excise
the malignancies in the area.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text: The area is clear. Let us begin.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Not all of the circuits are operating.
Select the ones that electricity seems
able to flow through, then link them.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_ALONE1A_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_ALONE1A_000.text:
Hmm. This circuit appears to be broken.
We should start again.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_ALONE1B_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_ALONE1B_000.text:
The electricity is now flowing.
Let us continue using this method
to reach the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_ALONE2A_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_ALONE2A_000.text:
Hmm. This circuit appears to be broken.
We should start again.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_ALONE3A_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_ALONE3A_000.text:
Hmm. This circuit appears to be broken.
We should start again.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_ALONE3B_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_ALONE3B_000.text:
All right, we have electricity flowing all
the way to the Cognitheon. Now to restore
power to the main part itself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_005_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_005_CUT_000_000.text:
We must create a path so it might
flow unimpeded to the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_020.text:
I will excise these malignancies,
lest they interfere.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_010.text:
I could not have done it without you,
Siugnas. You have my thanks.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Incidentally, I see one of
your kin fallen over yonder.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_050.text:
Heavens, man! You're hurt!
What happened to you!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_070.text:
I'm sorry... I failed to defend the
Cognitheon, and now...I'm done for...
I leave the Cognitheon...in your hands...

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_090.text: That wound that felled him... Hm.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_100.text:
Safed was the most powerful member of the
priesthood; no mere malignancy could have
ever laid him so low.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_130.text: We must visit the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Again, I sense your temple languishing.
What say you, blob?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The Circuleum has completely stopped!
If we don't do something, all activity
in the Kosmos will soon cease—but I
have absolutely no idea WHAT to do!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_000_CUT_000_020.text:
So long as death has not yet claimed it,
there are...ways. I, for example, have
been known to allow a dying victim to
drink greedily of my own blood.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm having a hard time seeing how
that's going to work, but I also don't
have a better idea, so let's try it!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_DASH_ATTACK_POS1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_DASH_ATTACK_POS1.text:
You seem like a man who knows how to
ram into things, so let us charge from
here to the temple. Go, blob!

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Mmm. The impact was lacking.
We may have been too close to
generate the necessary momentum.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.text: Curses! The malignancies have found us!

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.text:
The Circuleum appears
to be moving once more.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.text: Good. Now stand back while I mend it.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.text:
I suppose the impact may have been
a hair excessive, but no matter, for the
Circuleum moves once more.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.text: Good. Now stand back while I mend it.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.text:
First, I have malignancies
to grapple with.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_000.text: Fine work on your rounds today, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_030.text:
May I ask where you've been, Your Eminence?
I thought the Circuleum was your post.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_040.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_040.text:
I had urgent business elsewhere.
How are the other temples looking?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_050.text:
There were anomalies in all of them.
We took emergency measures in each case,
but the situation remains terribly unstable.
And I fear there is even worse news...

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_060.text:
Safed is dead. Murdered in cold blood
by an unknown assailant.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_090.text: May I ask a question, sir?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_110.text:
Why did you try to destroy the temples?
And why did you take Safed's life!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_120.text: Ah. Our murderer stands before us.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_130.text:
That is a dangerous accusation to be
bandying about without proof, Byaku.
Most dangerous indeed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_140.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_140.text:
But I do have proof, Your Eminence.
For while malignancies caused the anomalies
at the temples, it is obvious the damage
was inflicted with great purpose.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_150.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_150.text:
Additionally, Safed's wounds were
clearly not the work of a malignancy,
but of a fellow priest.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_160.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_160.text:
And the only one who would have had the
opportunity to lay him low was you,
High Priest Valkoinen!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_170.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_170.text:
Hmph! A fine deduction, Byaku. But what you
fail to grasp is that all I have done was in
accordance with the will of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_180.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_180.text: How can you possibly claim such!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_190.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_190.text:
...A malignancy? By the Kosmos!
The high priest has become malignant!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_200.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_200.text:
And now, Byaku, it is the will of the
Kosmos that you join Safed in death.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_210.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_010_210.text: Come at us then, if you dare!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_000.text:
The Kosmos has begun to initiate its own
ruination. Now let us see if you can resist
when your new destiny is bestowed upon
you by the universe itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_010.text:
Now this is getting interesting.
What say you, blob?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_020.text:
I've never heard of a benignancy turning into
a malignancy, nor of the Kosmos initiating its
own ruination. But I also cannot dismiss such
claims as mere tomfoolery.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_030.text:
Siugnas, my rounds are now finished.
I am deeply grateful for your help,
and sorry to have imposed upon you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_040.text: What do you intend to do now?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_050.text:
Maintaining peace within the Kosmos is my
sacred duty. Even if I must do it alone,
I will never cease my vigil.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_060.text:
Alone? The darkness of this world has only
just revealed itself to me, yet you would
look to deny me the pleasure of beholding
what comes next?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_080.text:
Er, you want to remain at my side?
I can't say for sure what will happen,
but I fear it would risk your life.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_090.text:
It is not the place of a blob with a
single eyeball to worry over a king.
Now where do we go next?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_010_CUT_020_100.text:
We go to the place where priests are
born in search of further information.

SUB_SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_000_CUT_00.text:
It seems I could leave through here,
should I desire it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Behold Thymus, the place from which we
priests hail. Most of the benignancies
that live in the Kosmos were born here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
As many benignancies still live here now,
one may know more about what's happening.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
You speak of this as a thriving city,
yet there is not a soul to be seen.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Something is definitely wrong here.
Be careful, Siugnas.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Malignancies... And so many!
How did they manage to break in here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
These were once your fellow benignancies.
As with your high priest, the infiltration
was not from without, but within.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_000.text: What can this mean? Could there possibly be an abnormality within the Kosmos itself?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_020.text:
No, wait! I'm not malignant!
Are you two still normal?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_050.text: Yes. Byaku of the Order of Leukos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_060.text: And you are a carrier, yes?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_070.text:
Tell me of these 'carriers.'
What are they?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_080.text:
Skittish cowards who run about dodging
malignancies as they transport things
from one place to another.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_090.text:
Oh, that's charming, especially coming from the
mouth of someone whose high priest was just killed.
Also, if you two are all that stands between chaos
and the Kosmos, I think we're all screwed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_110.text:
It appears we have acquired
another blob in our retinue.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_120.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_120.text:
I have a name, you know!
It's Erytheia!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_130.text: And I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_140.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_140.text:
Do you even know what you were fighting
when you battled those malignancies earlier?
They used to be benign!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_150.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_150.text:
Oh, we are very much aware; when the
high priest turned malignant earlier,
we were forced to end his life.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_170.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_170.text:
It would seem they all began to change after
hearing a divine message from the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_180.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_180.text:
The high priest also told us that the Kosmos
had initiated its own ruination. Do you know
anything about that, Carrier?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_190.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_190.text: No, but it wouldn't surprise me if the Kosmos decided to destroy itself. I mean, just take a look around. Things are bad.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_200.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_200.text:
You claim that the Kosmos is turning
benignancies into malignancies in an
effort to speed its own ruination?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_210.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_210.text:
Pretty much—but I'm not sure the Kosmos
actually knows that's what it's doing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_230.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_230.text:
The carrier is suggesting that someone has
interfered with the sacred will of the Kosmos
and is now pulling the strings, as it were.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_240.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_240.text:
Do not be vague, Erytheia.
You clearly know of whom
you speak.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_260.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_260.text:
The legendary malignancy that deceived God,
took control of the masses, and destroyed
the world? That's a fairy tale for zygotes!
Canker doesn't actually exist!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_270.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_270.text:
Ah, but all folklore has foundation in fact.
Why can't it actually be a real event
that occurred in the long-distant past?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_280.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_280.text:
If we assume for the moment that you are
correct, I suppose the return of Canker would
be enough to explain these abnormalities...

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_290.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_290.text:
A legendary malignancy?
Now this I desire to see.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_300.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_300.text:
You do not understand. Canker is immortal.
If he truly has returned to this world,
there is nothing we can do to stop him.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_310.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_310.text:
Actually, there might be one way—although
it would involve a priest like you working
very closely with a carrier like me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_320.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_320.text:
Absurd! No priest would ever join forces
with a mere carrier!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_330.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_330.text:
Figured you'd say that. Well, good luck
handling things by yourself, then!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_340.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_340.text:
W-wait! It is my sworn duty to protect this world.
So for the sake of that duty, I will—just this
once—debase myself to a level where I cooperate
with your lowly self.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_350.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_350.text:
No. Please. Stop, I can't take
so much flattery all at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_360.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_360.text:
Anyway, I'll take that as a yes and go on
ahead. When you're ready, come outside
so I can explain the details.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_370.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_370.text:
Every world has its ways; I know this well.
But we will need Erytheia's knowledge if
we are to meet this legendary malignancy.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_380.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_380.text:
I trust her like I trust a cyst—
yet sadly, we have no other leads.
But the moment she does anything
strange, you know what to do.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Do you understand what this clump is?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
I believe this is what's referred to as an
'abnormality' in your blobby tongue?
I sense a great dark power from within it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
This is one of Canker's roots.
He uses them to suck the life force
of the Kosmos from its temples,
which is what allows him to grow.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Wait... Something's amiss at the temples!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Because of Canker, the balance of the
entire Kosmos has begun to collapse.
We don't have much time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Have you some plan in mind, blob?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Holy powers that have been sealed within
the four great temples—ones said to be
effective against even the power of Canker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Also, I find it very odd that you—a priest—
are unaware of this. I thought it was a secret
that was passed down through your order.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Not nearly as odd as the fact that it's
known by a base carrier such as yourself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Transmitting info is a carrier's job;
we tend to pick up whispers along the way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, well, how do you intend to use these
antibodies against Canker when we don't
even know where the creature is?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Easy! We pump 'em into his roots
at the sides of the temples.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
So we use Canker's own
roots against him.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
You two can choose which temple to start with,
but we need to do this thing fast.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, and one more thing: we need the power
of prayer to unseal the antibodies,
which is where Byaku comes in.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Circuleum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_040.text:
That's the voice of the Circuleum.
It's controlling Byaku now.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_050.text: Why do you seek this power?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_060.text: I wish to be ever stronger.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_080.text: I seek to save the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_020_CUT_000_100.text:
And now we pump these antibodies
into Canker's root?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.text: Now we make for the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_00.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_03.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_04.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Digestica speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_05.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_05.text:
Display to me thine wisdom so I might
deem you worthy of my antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_06.text:
Only the basest of fools would
doubt the wisdom of a king.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_07.text:
Full is truth, and hungry is false.
Full, hungry, full, hungry expresses 10.
You supplicants must now express 100.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_08.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_08.text:
I think it wants us to figure out what
combination of the words 'full' and 'hungry'
will combine to express the number 100.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_09.text:
If full, hungry, full, hungry is 10,
100 would therefore be...

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_12.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_12.text: Full, full, hungry, hungry, full, hungry, hungry.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_15.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_15.text: What did you say to me, blob!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_16.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_16.text:
Calm down! I told you, the temple
may speak with Byaku's voice,
but those aren't his words.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_17.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_17.text:
O ye who are bereft of wisdom,
show me instead thine might!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_18.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_18.text: We will speak more of the manner in which you choose to address the Dismal King after I have slain these malignancies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_20.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_20.text:
And you have revealed yourself
a great fool for doubting it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_21.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_21.text:
This guy certainly doesn't
lack for confidence.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_22.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_22.text:
Thy request is granted.
The antibodies are yours.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_23.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_23.text:
And now we pump these antibodies
into Canker's root?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_01.text:
Your might is impressive, supplicant.
The antibodies are yours.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_02.text:
And now we pump these antibodies
into Canker's root?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.text: Now we make for the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I am sorry, Blan, but those who have become
malignancies can never again be benign.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Y-yes, of course... Forgive me, sir.
I...I won't cause you any trouble.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_040.text: Blan, no! What are you doing!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_070.text:
He did not even try to fight it?
What a dull affair.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_040.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Respiquary speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_050.text: To ye I bestow the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.text:
The malignancies will get in the way.
Deal with them first!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.text: Now we make for the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Your blob friend is dead, priest.
That is a malignancy.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, poor Safed. He deserves to be at peace.
Might I ask you to grant him that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_040.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Cognitheon speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_050.text: To ye I bestow the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.text:
Now we pump the antibodies
into Canker's root.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.text: Now we make for the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.text:
We have used all
of the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.text: I no longer sense the presence of Canker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
As suspected, the life force of
your temple is waning once more.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
And something is emerging
from the temple!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Canker!? But we defeated him!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
He's metastasized; his physical form
has already found refuge here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
What now? You have no antibodies
with which you might resist him.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Yes, but the antibodies have weakened him;
you should be able to destroy him now.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
As we should have done from the beginning!
The darkness I command will absorb all!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: It is accomplished.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: No. It's not.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
How so? Canker lies dead,
consumed by my darkness.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Oh, he's dead all right...for the moment.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Don't get all cryptic on me!
What's going on here!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Canker is an immortal malignancy that
always returns to life eventually.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
If that is the case,
you have no path to victory.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Unless we remove the corpse from the
Kosmos so it can never return again.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Madness! If we leave the Kosmos, WE may never
be able to return! And even if we wanted to take
the risk, how can we possibly transport so large
a corpse!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
You? You won't do anything.
But me? Well, I'm a carrier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
The Dismal King will not prevent you
from using your life as you see fit.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Needless to say, this will be my final task.
I'll head out right away.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Carri... Nay, Erytheia. Thank you.
And please know that I am sorry.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
What's gotten into you, Byaku?
This isn't like you at all.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Thanks for all your help too,
Siugnas. Be well...and goodbye.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: I expect we will meet again.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.text:
And mine to you. A part of me even wishes
I could go with you, but alas, my priestly
duties require me to remain here and
safeguard the Kosmos from harm.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_03.text: And here is where you belong.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_04.text:
I trust you will use your power to protect
something equally worthy. As a fellow
guardian, I wish you great success.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_010_00.text:
Hm... What are these
things growing here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_00.text:
Those are the mucolisks. It is their duty to absorb
things which have been drawn into the Kosmos
and transport them to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_01.text:
The life force of even these mucolisks
seems to be flagging. Does this qualify
as one of your abnormalities?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_02.text:
Yes, something certainly seems to be amiss.
Perhaps they have been overloaded by excessive
activity? This would also explain why the
Digestica is in such poor condition.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_03.text: And what will you do about it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_04.text:
Fortunately, some of the mucolisks seem to
be functioning normally. Let us attempt to
harvest a bit of healthy mucus from them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_01.text:
We culture the harvested mucus in the Digestica,
which will send it back out to the mucolisks.
Absorbing this new healthy mucus should bring
them back to their normal selves.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_02.text:
Very well. Let us begin
by gathering the mucus.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_03.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_03.text:
Just watch for the overloaded mucolisks!
They'll absorb you if you get too close.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_04.text:
I would be most curious to see the
world that awaits those who have
been absorbed by mucolisks.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_105_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_105_CUT_000_00.text:
Go harvest mucus from the functioning mucolisks,
but watch out for the overloaded ones!
They'll absorb you if you get too close.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: This is the last of them.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: We should have enough mucus now.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: Then let us return to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_110_CUT_000_00.text:
Now the power of the Digestica will cultivate
the mucus and send it out to the mucolisks.
That should be enough to restore them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_00.text:
Life force is returning to the Digestica,
and the mucolisks now function normally.
But what was the cause of the abnormality?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_01.text:
I imagine they were reacting to an excessive—
and unknown—stimulus. We will need to perform
a full investigation at a later time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_02.text: For now, we continue our rounds.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_000.text:
The Respiquary is the temple that regulates
the atmosphere of the Kosmos. We should find
my subordinate Blan somewhere around here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_010.text:
The life force of this
temple is also waning.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_020.text:
We have a serious problem here, sir!
A malignancy lurks in the alveoli!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm not entirely sure, sir!
Probably one of the unhealthy ones?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_050.text:
The 'alveoli' must be what's
growing around us, yes?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_000.text:
The darker ones are clearly unwell.
Perhaps malignancies hide among them?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
Look at this foreign body strolling around
like he owns the place! Should I take him
out with extreme prejudice, sir!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Easy, Blan. He is my guardian—and while
he may be a foreign body, I trust he knows
about that of which he speaks.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_105_CUT_000_000.text:
We need only investigate the darker,
unhealthy alveoli; we will likely find
a malignancy lurking among them.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
I don't see any around here.
Any luck with you, Blan?

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: It must be closer to the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: It might be further from the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
It has to be somewhere on the side
closer to the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
It could be somewhere on the side
closer to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
The matter is settled.
Little more than a trifle.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Hang on... Oh yeah, I think there's
still a malignancy around here, sir.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Hide all you want, malignancy!
None escape the Dismal King!

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
I sense no more malignancies, sir.
I think we excised them all.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Then all that's left to do is
restore the Respiquary itself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_110_CUT_000_000.text:
I will revive the Respiquary.
Lend me your aid, Blan.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_000.text: Everything should be fine now, sir!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_010.text: Still, it's unusual for malignancies to attack around the Respiquary instead of simply assaulting it directly.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_020.text:
It's almost like they're learning, sir!
Which is VERY disturbing!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_030.text:
If the both of you share that perception,
it is likely to be true.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_000_010.text:
This is the Circuleum—that which maintains the
very life of the Kosmos. It is a temple guarded
by our High Priest Valkoinen himself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Your Eminence! Are you here!?
It's Byaku, I've come on my rounds!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_000_030.text:
We are not your only visitors,
priest. See there.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_010_010.text:
High Priest Valkoinen!
Wh-what happened here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_010_020.text:
We were attacked by a pack of malignancies.
I'm excising them as fast as I am able,
but there are simply too many to deal with.
You must lend me your aid!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Allow us to handle this, Your Eminence!
Siugnas, take care of it!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_000.text: The enemy has been put to rout.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_010.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_010.text:
You are quite the potent warrior, friend.
But who are you, exactly?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_020.text:
I am Siugnas, and I aid this blob
for reasons that are my own.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_030.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_030.text:
Is that so? Well, Siugnas, I think I could
make use of your particular brand of help.
Will you hear my request?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_050.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_050.text:
As you have no doubt observed, there is an
abnormality in the Circuleum. I would like
to stop nibbling around the edges and deal
with the problem at its source.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_060.text:
Then those malignancies
were not the source?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_070.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_020_070.text:
No, the abnormality has a different source.
Look there, if you would.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_000.text: Thymus is enveloped in a wall of fat!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_020.text:
Thymus is the homeland of all
who dwell within the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_030.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_030.text:
Every day, new citizens are born in Thymus.
The work they do serves as a major power
source for the Circuleum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_040.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_040.text:
Sadly, the sudden appearance of that wall
is interfering with their activities.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_050.text:
So the blobs are sealed within this wall?
If so, the obvious solution would be
to break them out.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_060.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_060.text:
One cannot break through a wall of fat
using conventional means. Use this.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_070.text:
What is this nauseating glob you
have inflicted upon my hand!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_080.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_080.text:
Those are mitochondria. If you smear
them clockwise around the entire wall,
that should deal with the matter.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_090.text:
Clockwise around a wall?
Are these the steps of a ritual curse?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_100.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_100_CUT_030_100.text:
As I cannot abandon my post,
I'm trusting the two of you to
deal with this in my stead.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_105_CUT_000_000.text:
You will need to circle around the wall
clockwise in order to smear the mitochondria
onto it and release those trapped within.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text: Ah, excellent! The wall is gone.

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
That is fortunate for your superior, as I had
intended to hurl the glob at him if it failed
to work. What manner of nonsense is this,
breaking walls by smearing things upon them?

SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_SIUG_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
Regardless, we should report our success
to the high priest at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_000_000.text:
My thanks for your efforts. The Circuleum
should be up and running again in no time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_000_010.text:
You will explain the workings of this structure,
High Blob! Why is it vulnerable to sticky globs
of liquid, and why must said globs be applied
in a clockwise manner!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_000_030.text:
A highly advanced curse indeed.
Perhaps it is best I not antagonize
this particular blob.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_010_000.text:
If I may, Your Eminence, what made
that wall appear in the first place?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_010_010.text:
I don't know. Perhaps it was malignancies—or
perhaps not. Such a thing has not happened before,
and I intend to perform a full investigation.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_HEART_110_CUT_010_020.text: Then we should continue on our way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_010.text:
That is the Cognitheon—the command center which
controls the other holy sites. A contemporary
of mine named Safed is in charge of its defense.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, Safed. Any irregularities
here at the Cognitheon?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Something is definitely wrong here:
the electrical flow from the circuits
is unstable, which leaves the Cognitheon
running at a diminished capacity.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_050.text:
The circuits are these objects
around the temple?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_000.text:
There's something rather strange
about the circuits over that way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_010.text:
Mmm. Their power does not appear
to be flowing properly.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_040.text: Will you not repair those circuits?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_050.text:
Much as I'd love to do that, keeping the
Cognitheon running is a full-time job.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_060.text:
Temple maintenance is your
field of expertise, blob!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_080.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_080.text:
I'm afraid I must count
on you to do it for me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_090.text:
If I'm doing this, then as my bodyguard,
you'll be doing it as well.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_100.text:
It seems I've little choice
in this matter.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_110.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_110.text: Despite my volunteering to go, I don't actually have the faintest idea how to go about repairing them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_120.text:
There may be some pattern to
the way in which they flicker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_130.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_130.text:
Of course! The order in which they're flickering
is the way the electricity flows, which means
we should fix them in the same order.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_105_CUT_000_000.text:
They're flickering in the same order as the
flow of electricity, which means we need to
fix them in the order of the flickers.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.text: Then we start over from the beginning.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.text:
The circuits appear to be
functioning normally now.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.text:
Let us return to the Cognitheon
and report our success to Safed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Wonderful! In that case, the Cognitheon
should return to normal capacity soon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_020.text:
Except... Oh no! We're being infiltrated
by malignancies! Siugnas, please!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_110_CUT_010_000.text:
The Cognitheon has been restored.
Thank you both for your help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_000.text:
I still don't understand why the circuits
failed in the first place, but I suppose
we'll have to accept this as good enough.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_010.text: Now then, on with my rounds!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_000.text:
That completes my rounds. You were quite
a big help, Siugnas—my apologies at having
kept you for so long.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_010.text:
As much as I have enjoyed my journey,
I did not find anyone worthy to serve
as a thrall.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_020.text:
I do not know if it will be what you seek,
but some in the Order of Leukos say those
beloved by the Kosmos enjoy a special gift. Were I you, I would return to where your 
journey started here and look for it.
Alas, I myself have more yet to do.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_040.text: Then this is where we part.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_060.text: You're a strange one...but I am happy to have the protection.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PATROL_END_CUT_000_080.text: I have business in Thymus. Let us be off!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_010.text:
I had a feeling you'd come once I heard
the news, Byaku. Er, but who's this?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_020.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.
I have been aiding your priest.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Fair enough. Well, I'm Erytheia,
and I'm a carrier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Carriers risk their lives transporting both
objects and information from place to place.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Do we need this blob
to deliver something?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_060.text:
No. We are here to access her vast knowledge.
Erytheia, do you have any insights into this
strange string of recent incidents?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_070.text:
Well, it's certainly different from the
malignancies' usual routine. It's almost like
they're observing how we go about our work.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_080.text:
So their goal is not to destroy the Kosmos,
but to learn more about it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_090.text:
That tracks with what I've seen.
The question is, why?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: RedBloodCell
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Halp! Haaalp! A giant foreign body has
appeared outside—one we've never seen!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_000.text:
This is unlike the malignancies
we faced before.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
That's not a malignancy—it's a parasite.
I never imagined I'd see one with my
own eye, but here we are.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
I've heard of parasites: they're bothersome
foreign bodies that suck the life from
other, better creatures.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Parasites possess the ability to control
malignancies; I think it's safe to conclude
that all of this is their doing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_040.text:
Then they seek to guide the Kosmos into
the darkness? If so, these parasites may
be the creatures I seek!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_050.text:
Are you out of your mind? Parasites don't
just influence malignancies, they can take
control of us—AND of you! If they establish
a foothold, it's over for all of us.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_060.text:
I will never permit that to happen.
Excise them, Siugnas!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_HEART_100_CUT.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_HEART_100_CUT.text: Excise them all! Let none survive!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_LUNGS_100_CUT.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_LUNGS_100_CUT.text:
Your devious schemes end here,
foul parasite!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_BRAIN_100_CUT.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_BRAIN_100_CUT.text: I will never let you take the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text: That should be the last of the parasites.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text: Wait! Something's amiss at the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text:
There appears to be some
manner of anomaly that way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_010.text:
Some of them have survived. Now, parasites!
Show me this power you would use to plunge
all the Kosmos into darkness!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_020.text: The Cognitheon is the brain of the Kosmos. If the parasite can establish itself there, it can usurp its will and become the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Perhaps that was the plan all along and
the other parasites were but distractions.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_040.text:
And we completely fell for it.
A massive miscalculation!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_050.text:
The parasite has already begun to fuse!
It's sucking power out of the Cognitheon
in order to strengthen itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_060.text:
The Kosmos teeters on the brink of ruin.
What are we to do?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_070.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_070.text:
Wait, look at the circuits over there...
They're still operating—though barely.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_000.text: Those are the circuits we repaired earlier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_010.text:
What if we repair them again, restoring the
flow of electricity to the Cognitheon?
Once restored to full strength, the Cognitheon
may be able to resist the parasites.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_020.text: It's certainly worth a try. Er, do you know how to do that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_030.text:
We repair them in the order
they flicker, just as before.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_040.text:
We'll only have one chance at this.
Go, Siugnas! For the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_000.text:
We must repair the circuits in
the order that they flicker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_010.text: We have but one chance! Hurry!

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_120_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_120_CUT_000.text:
And we've no time to start over,
so this is where the fun begins!

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.text:
Your repairs stopped the parasite from
seizing control, and also gave the
Cognitheon the power to fight it off.

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.text:
That gives us a chance to excise
the parasite for good!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_000.text: It's stopped moving. Did we kill it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_010.text:
No, it's still alive. Blast,
but it's a tenacious one!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_000.text:
With the flow of electricity severed,
it will attempt to take over again.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_010.text:
So we must repair the circuits again?
Fie, is there no end to this hassle!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_000.text: It's stopped moving. Did we kill it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_010.text:
No, it's still alive. Blast,
but it's a tenacious one!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_020.text:
If we have time enough to
discuss the matter...

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_030.text:
Then we have a chance to
fix the circuits! Hurry!

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_140_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_140_CUT_000.text:
The parasite's on the move again!
Get back to the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_150_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_SIUG_NEURONSICK_150_CUT_000.text:
The parasite's been repelled!
Now's our chance!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_140_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_140_CUT_000_000.text: Show me your vile might, parasite!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_010.text:
I cannot thank you enough
for your help, Siugnas.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_020.text: As I enjoyed the experience tremendously, please allow me to thank you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_030.text:
Some in the Order of Leukos say those
beloved by the Kosmos enjoy a special gift.
You should return to where your journey
started here and look for it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_00.text: And here is the way out.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_02.text: Siugnas, wait! Take me with you!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_03.text: And what of your duties, blob?

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_04.text:
They'll be fine—so I'm going with you
whether you want me to or not!

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_05.text: Ha ha ha! Just take him already.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_06.text:
If you have already made up your mind,
I will not to attempt to dissuade you.
Come, then. Join the Dismal King.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_08.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_08.text:
Goodbye, old friend!
See you again someday.

SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W06_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.text:
This must be my gift from the Kosmos.
I gladly accept its offering of blood.
